Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:44:47
Folder: C3EUV2W - road safety awareness campaign
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C3EUV2W_00
From: Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>
To: Group HSSE <GroupHSSE@chalhoub.com>
CC: Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>; Philip Abdou <Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>; Javeed Sathar <Javeed.Sathar@chalhoub.com>; Nancy Avila <Nancy.Avila@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-21 16:45
Subject: Road Safety Awareness Campaign
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

I’m excited to invite you all to be part of our Road Safety Awareness Campaign which is a collaboration project between Chalhoub Group and the Emirates Driving Institute to improve road safety and provide our team members with some technical knowledge about vehicle safety and safe behaviours. 

 

The event will take place in our DIP Distribution Center on 10th and 11th of December from 10 am to 6 pm. And there will be different experience like seatbelt convincer, roll over car simulator, tire safety and road safety toolbox talks.

 

Road safety is becoming very critical for companies like us, considering the number of hours our team members spent on the road every day. and the worrying number of accidents per year in the UAE (4,391 traffic accident in 2023) resulted 352 deaths. 

 

We need your support to share the below link with all your team members for wide participation and engagement.

 

Thank you in advance and we hope to see you all there.

 

Regards 

Rawad

Road safety is becoming very critical for companies like us, considering the number of hours our team members spent on the road every day. and the worrying number of accidents per year in the UAE (4,391 traffic accident in 2023) resulted 352 deaths. 

 

We need your support to share the below link with all your team members for wide participation and engagement.

 

Thank you in advance and we hope to see you all there.

 

Regards 

Rawad 

 

 

RAWAD HOSSEIN​​​​

DIRECTOR ‑ HSSE

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Group Tax launches the Group Transfer Pricing Policy, which was developed to ensure alignment with global compliance and regulatory obligations.

Group Tax launches the Group Transfer Pricing Policy, which was developed to ensure alignment with global compliance and regulatory obligations. 

This policy is fundamental in guiding pricing of intercompany transactions and arrangements across our legal entities to ensure transparency, consistency, and compliance.

BREAKING THE SILENCE: THINGS WE DON’T TALK ABOUT ENOUGH

For any questions or clarification, please reach out to Group Tax team – Mariel Yard (VP - Tax) or Nehaal Kadge (TP Lead).

 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XU2aFSQC50WDUqq6Jr68PQ/544513/31C73848A8F5FC574AE3BC7EC3612A14/nuggets-12.png> 


BREAKING THE SILENCE: THINGS WE DON’T TALK ABOUT ENOUGH

For Men's Health Month, we’re holding a space for an open and honest conversation about topics you don’t often discuss. Join Coach Adil for a session focused on the value of expression and shifting from a “grind mindset” to a “growth mindset.” Have any questions you’d prefer to ask anonymously?
